name: Super Rope Hero - Crime City
description:
Super Rope Hero - Crime City Game is a strange gangster simulator in third-person view, where you become a superhero or a ninja rope hero.

Super Rope Hero - Crime City has special real powers. You can shoot dangerous laser beams from your eyes. You can shoot a rope to a building and climb over the building to the top.

Super Rope Hero - Crime City Game is a hero game for all those who love ninja hero and mafia gangster crime simulator game!

Mafia gangster, Vegas write the crime stories in the open crime world:
Rope hero saves the grand crime city from car snatchers, mafia gangster crime, and auto theft crime
Vegas gangster crime city in detailed environments with open-world crime city in real gangster games
Rope hero adventure in a gangster Vegas city to explore grand city
Rope hero highly futuristic grand city crime gangster simulator game
Amazing crime super rope hero jump high to cover the larger distances of grand city gangster
Ninja rope hero crime stories in the grand crime simulator games
Mafia gangster overwhelming web in gangster crime city
Ninja rope hero game help you unlock more rope hero suits to play

Intense Super Rope Hero action combination-fused Gangstar Vegas crime-fighting by shooting webs at bullet firing opponents and punching all your enemies in this cool crime-filled thriller crime simulator game.

Flying Super Rope Hero - Crime City Game is simulator gameplay:

Super Rope Hero fighting in the gangster crime city with cool music & sounds real gangster game
Ninja frog rope hero game with nice graphics and beautiful animations of grand crime city
Super Rope Hero gameplay with a variety of superhero levels in gangster Vegas crime simulator game
Super rope hero with fantastic action thrilled auto theft crime gameplay of ninja hero
Rope hero fight against the incredible crime gangsters who are destroying the buildings and offices

Super Rope Hero how to play:

Ninja frog hero fly in the air using a rope at every point
Super rope hero fight as a savor of your futuristic grand crime city not for yourself in a battle zone
Show your rope hero shooting skills and stop all the villains standing in your way
City rope hero defeat enemies and stop their illegal activities from the street grand city
Mafia gangster crime Vegas using your rope hero building climbing styles
Grand city makes you run as a rope hero ninja frog game
In gangster vegas super spider power spider can save the people
Super hero, ninja frog combat skills in this alliance battle

The Super Rope Hero game has a rope hero climb because of your flying strategies in this super spider rope hero alliance battle and no one can beat you in this city.

Super Rope Hero Game superheroes are fighting in your support, you are everyone's hope and they are calling you my amazing spider hero, show some super villain stealthy action for the survival of your futuristic grand city gangster crime and make it secure.

Install Super Rope Hero game now to become the city rope hero in the gangster Vegas crime city. If you like this amazing super rope hero game then please give us a good rating to support our rope game! Many thanks!
